body: Hey guys, I want to do a gold rank giveaway, this time it will not be randomized, I'm asking for  YOU To Draw a minecraft related picture! It must be by You. Please do not post Inappropriate drawing! Post your IGN and Skype along with the picture below.  Have fun! and Good luck!
